story-1: Madrí Excepcional is a unique collaboration between Molson Coors and Madrid’s La Sagra Brewery, which was born to embody the Soul of Madrid, or as we like to call it, El Alma De Madrid
story-2: Madrí Excepcional has all the taste characteristics of a modern European-style lager. The crisp, clean and refreshing beverage is full of flavour and aroma at 4.6% ABV, serving a refreshing, balanced taste born from the streets of modern Madrid.
story-3: See that guy on our packaging? He’s a “Chulapo” – originally a group of people in Spanish society in the 19th century, famous for their vibrant and elaborate style of dress. Today, they represent the people of modern Madrid, full of life and energy. It’s this progressive spirit of modern Madrid that inspired Madrí Excepcional.
